padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;person in people&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>{{ person.name  }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>{{ person.age  }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>{{ person.sex  }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">tr</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">tbody</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">table</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> vm = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>,\r\n            data: {\r\n                people: [{\r\n                    name: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Jack&#39;</span>,\r\n                    age: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">30</span>,\r\n                    sex: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Male&#39;</span>\r\n                }, {\r\n                    name: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Bill&#39;</span>,\r\n                    age: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">26</span>,\r\n                    sex: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Male&#39;</span>\r\n                }, {\r\n                    name: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Tracy&#39;</span>,\r\n                    age: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">22</span>,\r\n                    sex: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Female&#39;</span>\r\n                }, {\r\n                    name: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Chris&#39;</span>,\r\n                    age: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">36</span>,\r\n                    sex: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Male&#39;</span>\r\n                }]\r\n            }\r\n        })\r\n    </span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	我们在选项对象的data属性中定义了一个people数组，然后在#app元素内使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-for</code>遍历people数组，输出每个person对象的姓名、年龄和性别。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160627065327202-406012811.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"294\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1012096336-10.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"469\" /></a></p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/01.GettingStarted/v-for.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	v-bind指令</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-bind</code>指令可以在其名称后面带一个参数，中间放一个冒号隔开，这个参数通常是HTML元素的特性（attribute），例如：<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-bind:class</code></p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nv-bind:<em style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">argument</em>=&quot;<em style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">expression</em>&quot;</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	下面这段代码构建了一个简单的分页条，v-bind指令作用于元素的class特性上。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	这个指令包含一个表达式，表达式的含义是：高亮当前页。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">meta</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">charset</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;UTF-8&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">link</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">rel</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;stylesheet&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;styles/demo.css&quot;</span> /&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">ul</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;pagination&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">li</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-for</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;n in pageCount&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;javascripit:void(0)&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;activeNumber === n + 1 ? &#39;active&#39; : &#39;&#39;&quot;</span>&gt;</span>{{ n + 1 }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">li</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">ul</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> vm = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>,\r\n            data: {\r\n                activeNumber: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span>,\r\n                pageCount: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">10</span>\r\n            }\r\n        })\r\n    </span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	注意<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-for=&quot;n in pageCount&quot;</code>这行代码，pageCount是一个整数，遍历时n从0开始，然后遍历到pageCount &ndash;1结束。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160627065328499-156638431.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"105\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/10120a3V-11.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"500\" /></a></p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/01.GettingStarted/v-bind.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	v-on指令</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-on</code>指令用于给监听DOM事件，它的用语法和v-bind是类似的，例如监听&lt;a&gt;元素的点击事件：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-on:click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;doSomething&quot;</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	有两种形式调用方法：<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">绑定一个方法（让事件指向方法的引用），或者使用内联语句。</strong><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	Greet按钮将它的单击事件直接绑定到greet()方法，而Hi按钮则是调用say()方法。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">meta</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">charset</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;UTF-8&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">input</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">type</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;text&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-model</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;message&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!--click事件直接绑定一个方法--&gt;</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-on:click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;greet&quot;</span>&gt;</span>Greet<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!--click事件使用内联语句--&gt;</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-on:click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;say(&#39;Hi&#39;)&quot;</span>&gt;</span>Hi<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> vm = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>,\r\n            data: {\r\n                message: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Hello, Vue.js!&#39;</span>\r\n            },\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 在 `methods` 对象中定义方法</span>\r\n            methods: {\r\n                greet: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n                    <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// // 方法内 `this` 指向 vm</span>\r\n                    alert(<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">this</span>.message)\r\n                },\r\n                say: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">(msg)</span> {</span>\r\n                    alert(msg)\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n        })\r\n    </span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160627065330109-1825840680.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"5\" height=\"483\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/10120943c-12.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"5\" width=\"457\" /></a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	v-bind和v-on的缩写</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	Vue.js为最常用的两个指令<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-bind</code>和<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-on</code>提供了缩写方式。<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">v-bind指令可以缩写为一个冒号，v-on指令可以缩写为@符号。</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!--完整语法--&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;javascripit:void(0)&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;activeNumber === n + 1 ? &#39;active&#39; : &#39;&#39;&quot;</span>&gt;</span>{{ n + 1 }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!--缩写语法--&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;javascripit:void(0)&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">:class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;activeNumber=== n + 1 ? &#39;active&#39; : &#39;&#39;&quot;</span>&gt;</span>{{ n + 1 }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!--完整语法--&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-on:click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;greet&quot;</span>&gt;</span>Greet<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!--缩写语法--&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span> @<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;greet&quot;</span>&gt;</span>Greet<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	综合示例</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	现在我们已经介绍了一些Vue.js的基础知识了，结合以上知识我们可以来做个小Demo。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">link</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">rel</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;stylesheet&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">href</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;styles/demo.css&quot;</span> /&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	总结</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('24','19','<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	概述</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	vue-router是Vue.js官方的路由插件，它和vue.js是深度集成的，适合用于构建单页面应用。vue的单页面应用是基于路由和组件的，路由用于设定访问路径，并将路径和组件映射起来。传统的页面应用，是用一些超链接来实现页面切换和跳转的。在vue-router单页面应用中，则是路径之间的切换，也就是组件的切换。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	本文将以示例的形式来介绍vue-router的各个特性，一共包含6个示例，每个示例都有乞丐版，前5个示例有皇帝版。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	乞丐版是将所有代码混杂在一起的HTML页面，皇帝版是基于vue-webpack-simple模板构建的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	乞丐版可以让你快速地了解到vue-router的一些特性和API；皇帝版则基于.vue组件和单独的路由配置，更适用于实际的应用。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	本文的Demo和源代码已放到GitHub，如果您觉得内容不错，请点个赞，或在GitHub上加个星星！</p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	现在我们以一个简单的单页面应用开启vue-router之旅，这个单页面应用有两个路径：<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">/home</code>和<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">/about</code>，与这两个路径对应的是两个组件Home和About。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160721065505341-239606947.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"351\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/105QHM4-0.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"526\" /></a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	1. 创建组件</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	首先引入vue.js和vue-router.js：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n&lt;script src=<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;<span class=\"xml\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue-router.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span></span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	然后创建两个组件构造器Home和About：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> Home = Vue.extend({\r\n    template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h1&gt;Home&lt;/h1&gt;&lt;p&gt;{{msg}}&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&#39;</span>,\r\n    data: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> {\r\n            msg: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Hello, vue router!&#39;</span>\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n})\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> About = Vue.extend({\r\n    template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;div&gt;&lt;h1&gt;About&lt;/h1&gt;&lt;p&gt;This is the tutorial about vue-router.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&#39;</span>\r\n})</pre>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	2. 创建Router</h2>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> router = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> VueRouter()</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	调用构造器VueRouter，创建一个路由器实例router。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	3. 映射路由</h2>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nrouter.map({\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;/home&#39;</span>: { component: Home },\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;/about&#39;</span>: { component: About }\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	调用router的map方法映射路由，每条路由以key-value的形式存在，key是路径，value是组件。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	例如：<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">&#39;/home&#39;</code>是一条路由的key，它表示路径；<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">{component: Home}</code>则表示该条路由映射的组件。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	4. 使用v-link指令</h2>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n&lt;div <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;list-group&quot;</span>&gt;\r\n    <span class=\"xml\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;list-group-item&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-link</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;{ path: &#39;/home&#39;}&quot;</span>&gt;</span>Home<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;list-group-item&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-link</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;{ path: &#39;/about&#39;}&quot;</span>&gt;</span>About<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">a</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在a元素上使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-link</code>指令跳转到指定路径。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	5. 使用&lt;router-view&gt;标签</h2>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">router-view</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">router-view</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在页面上使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">&lt;router-view&gt;&lt;/router-view&gt;</code>标签，它用于渲染匹配的组件。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	6. 启动路由</h2>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> App = Vue.extend({})\r\nrouter.start(App, <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>)\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	路由器的运行需要一个根组件，<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">router.start(App, &#39;#app&#39;)&nbsp;</code>表示router会创建一个App实例，并且挂载到#app元素。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">注意：</strong>使用vue-router的应用，不需要显式地创建Vue实例，而是调用start方法将根组件挂载到某个元素。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160721065507591-615807711.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"36\" height=\"399\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/105QJ527-1.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; max-width: 800px; display: inline;\" title=\"36\" width=\"691\" /></a></p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/06.Router/basic/basic_01.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	当你从GitHub上获取到最新的源代码后，如果想运行皇帝版，以demo01为例，在Git Bash下执行以下命令：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nnpm run demo01-dev</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160721071509529-2128582915.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/105QJ033-2.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	然后在浏览器中访问地址<a href=\"http://127.0.0.1:8080/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\">http://127.0.0.1:8080</a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	如果要编译和发布，请在Git Bash下执行以下命令：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nnpm run demo01-build</pre>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	编写单页面的步骤</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	上面的6个步骤，可以说是创建一个单页面应用的基本步骤：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160721065509466-1679223492.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"442\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/105QL156-3.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"632\" /></a></p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	JavaScript</h3>\r\n<ol style=\"margin: 0px 0px 0px 30px; padding-right: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">创建组件</span>：创建单页面应用需要渲染的组件</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">创建路由</span>：创建VueRouter实例</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">映射路由</span>：调用VueRouter实例的map方法</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">启动路由</span>：调用VueRouter实例的start方法</li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	HTML</h3>\r\n<ol style=\"margin: 0px 0px 0px 30px; padding-right: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		使用<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">v-link</span>指令</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		使用<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);\">&lt;router-view&gt;</span>标签</li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	router.redirect</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	应用在首次运行时右侧是一片空白，应用通常都会有一个首页，例如：Home页。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">router.redirect</code>方法将根路径重定向到/home路径：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nrouter.redirect({\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;/&#39;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;/home&#39;</span>\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">router.redirect</code>方法用于为路由器定义全局的重定向规则，全局的重定向会在匹配当前路径之前执行。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	执行过程</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	当用户点击<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-link</code>指令元素时，我们可以大致猜想一下这中间发生了什么事情：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		vue-router首先会去查找<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-link</code>指令的路由映射</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		然后根据路由映射找到匹配的组件</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		最后将组件渲染到<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">&lt;router-view&gt;</code>标签</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160721065510607-907267034.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"617\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/105QJ414-4.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"768\" /></a></p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	嵌套路由(02)</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	嵌套路由是个常见的需求，假设用户能够通过路径<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">/home/news</code>和<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">/home/message</code>访问一些内容，一个路径映射一个组件，访问这两个路径也会分别渲染两个组件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160721065511544-2069972245.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"460\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/105QH3Z-5.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"457\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	实现嵌套路由有两个要点：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		在组件内部使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">&lt;router-view&gt;</code>标签</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		在路由器对象中给组件定义子路由</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	现在我们就动手实现这个需求。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	组件模板：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">li</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">li</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">ul</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	组件构造器：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857;
