font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	目录下生成了一个文件夹my-webpack-demo：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160717133638795-1492790433.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11014C934-13.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	文件目录结构如下（参考：<a href=\"https://vuejs-templates.github.io/webpack/structure.html\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" title=\"https://vuejs-templates.github.io/webpack/structure.html\">https://vuejs-templates.github.io/webpack/structure.html</a>）</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"cc798ef1d1de4e2e86f8e6b62230bf96\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n├── build/                      # webpack config files\r\n│   └── ...\r\n├── config/                     \r\n│   ├── index.js                # main project config\r\n│   └── ...\r\n├── src/\r\n│   ├── main.js                 # app entry file\r\n│   ├── App.vue                 # main app component\r\n│   ├── components/             # ui components\r\n│   │   └── ...\r\n│   └── assets/                 # module assets (processed by webpack)\r\n│       └── ...\r\n├── static/                     # pure static assets (directly copied)\r\n├── test/\r\n│   └── unit/                   # unit tests\r\n│   │   ├── specs/              # test spec files\r\n│   │   ├── index.js            # test build entry file\r\n│   │   └── karma.conf.js       # test runner config file\r\n│   └── e2e/                    # e2e tests\r\n│   │   ├── specs/              # test spec files\r\n│   │   ├── custom-assertions/  # custom assertions <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">for</span> e2e tests\r\n│   │   ├── runner.js           # test runner script\r\n│   │   └── nightwatch.conf.js  # test runner config file\r\n├── .babelrc                    # babel config\r\n├── .editorconfig.js            # editor config\r\n├── .eslintrc.js                # eslint config\r\n├── index.html                  # index.html template\r\n└── package.json                # build scripts and dependencies</pre>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	2. 安装依赖</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行以下两行命令，安装项目依赖：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"hljs bash\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-built_in\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 134, 179);\">cd</span> my-webpack-demo\r\nnpm install</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160717133640311-294822937.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11014B048-14.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	（安装过程较为缓慢，需要耐心等待&hellip;）</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	3. 运行示例</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行以下命令运行示例：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"hljs coffeescript\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-built_in\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 134, 179);\">npm</span> run dev</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	打开127.0.0.1:8080，可以看到以下画面：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160717133642139-244405191.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"651\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1101461519-15.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"585\" /></a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	4. 发布</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行以下命令生成发布：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"1d82aa1f862446a1baebe7a5d597a9f7\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nnpm run build</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160717133644107-2090524277.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"662\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11014B120-16.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"645\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	和vue-simple-webpack模板不同的是，所有的静态资源，包括index.html都生成到dist目录下了。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160717133645514-1214989084.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"461\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11014B455-17.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"414\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这意味着你可以直接拿着dist目录去发布应用，例如在IIS下将dist目录发布为一个网站。</p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	vue-simple-webpack示例</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	昨天我们使用了vue-simple-browserify模板做了一个小示例，今天我们就用vue-simple-webpack模板完成同样的示例。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	该示例的代码我就不贴出来了，大家可以到本文开头的GitHub地址去下载。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160717133646951-437806922.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: rgb(255, 99, 71);\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"335\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11014Cc7-18.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"697\" /></a></p>\r\n<div class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/05.OfficialTemplates/my-webpack-simple-demo/\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></div>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	总结</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	browserify和webpack都是打包和模块依赖管理工具，webpack拥有比browserify更强的功能，使用哪种工具取决于你们个人的偏好、项目的要求。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	毋庸置疑的是，Vue.js官方基于vue cli, browserify, webpack构筑的几个项目模板，确实能够给我们带来很大的便利，可以让我们快速地投入到开发中。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	在后面的篇章中，我将尽可能地基于这些项目模板来讲解Vue.js的点点滴滴。</p>\r\n','','','127.0.0.1','','');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('26','19','<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	概述</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在之前的一系列vue.js文章，我们都是用传统模式引用vue.js以及其他的js文件的，这在开发时会产生一些问题。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	首先，这限定了我们的开发模式是基于页面的，而不是基于组件的，组件的所有代码都直接写在页面中，这对于一些复杂的页面来说，不是好事情，代码的可读性会较差，也不便于管理。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	其次，定义在HTML页面中的组件，无法被其他页面重用，我们只能通过复制粘贴的方式将组件代码拷贝到其他页面，这也违反了DRY原则。既然组件是Vue.js的重要概念，我们就应该利用好它。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	为了解决这些问题，Vue.js官方提供了一些开发模板，这使得我们能够快速地配置好vue.js的开发环境。基于这些开发模板，将使用.vue文件定义组件，使组件代码从HTML页面代码中分离出来。在定义组件时，使用一些ES2015的便捷语法，将会使组件开发变得更加轻松。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	Vue.js官方提供了两种类型的模板项目：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">基于vue cli和browserify的项目模板</strong></li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">基于vue cli和webpack的项目模板</strong></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	vue cli是Vue.js官方提供的命令行创建Vue.js项目脚手架的工具。这两种类型的项目模板分别提供了<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">简单模式和完全模式</strong>，简单模式仅包含基于vue.js开发必要的一些资源和包，使用该模式可以快速地投入到开发。完全模式则还包括ESLink、单元测试等功能。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	今天我们首先介绍基于vue cli和browserify的项目模板。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	本文的Demo和源代码已放到GitHub，如果您觉得内容不错，请点个赞，或在GitHub上加个星星！</p>\r\n<div class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/05.OfficialTemplates/my-browserify-simple-demo/\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">vue-browserify-simple示例</a>&nbsp;<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://github.com/keepfool/vue-tutorials/tree/master/05.OfficialTemplates\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">GitHub Source</a></div>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	browserify介绍</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184654404-1711561150.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"436\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103402335-0.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"693\" /></a></p>\r\n<blockquote style=\"margin: 1em 40.75px; padding: 0px; background: none rgb(240, 240, 227); border-width: 2px 2px 2px 5px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(239, 239, 239) rgb(239, 239, 239) rgb(239, 239, 239) rgb(0, 83, 159); border-image: initial; min-height: 35px; line-height: 1.45; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px; position: relative; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n		Browsers don&#39;t have the require method defined, but Node.js does. With Browserify you can write code that uses require in the same way that you would use it in Node.</p>\r\n</blockquote>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<font color=\"#ff0000\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Browserify是一个CommonJS风格的模块及依赖管理工具，它不仅是一个打包工具，更关键的是其JavaScript的模块及依赖管理能力。</font></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	Browserify参照了Node中的模块系统，约定用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">require()</code>来引入其他模块，用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">module.exports</code>来引出模块。在我看来，Browserify不同于RequireJS和Sea.js的地方在于，它没有着力去提供一个&ldquo;运行时&rdquo;的模块加载器，而是强调进行预编译。预编译会带来一个额外的过程，但对应的，你也不再需要遵循一定规则去加一层包裹。因此，相比较而言，Browserify提供的组织方式更简洁，也更符合CommonJS规范。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	Browserify主页：<a href=\"http://browserify.org/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" title=\"http://browserify.org/\">http://browserify.org/</a></p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	vueify介绍</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	所谓vueify，就是使用.vue格式的文件定义组件，<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><font color=\"#ff0000\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">一个.vue文件就是一个组件。</font></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在.vue文件定义的组件内容包括3部分：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">&lt;style&gt;&lt;/style&gt;标签</strong>：定义组件样式</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">&lt;template&gt;&lt;/template&gt;标签</strong>：定义组件模板</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">&lt;script&gt;&lt;/script&gt;标签</strong>：定义组件的各种选项，比如data, methods等。</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	vue.js已经拥抱ES6了，使用.vue文件定义组件时，需要使用ES6的一些语法，ES6提供了一些较为优秀的特性，这使得定义组件的代码变得更加简洁。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	以下app.vue文件定义了一个组件：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"62ef87f4811641cd9e8d84c6ee3d5a79\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;red&quot;</span>&gt;</span>{{msg}}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\nexport <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">default</span> {\r\n  data () {\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> {\r\n      msg: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Hello world!&#39;</span>\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	你也可以在组件文件中使用预处理语言：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"50f00408f1b94a209f4308d97e42e08c\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n// app.vue\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">style</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">lang</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;stylus&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"css\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-class\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(68, 85, 136); font-weight: bold;\">.red</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">color</span> <span class=\"hljs-id\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(25, 70, 157);\">#f00</span>\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">style</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">lang</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;jade&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\nh1(class=&quot;red&quot;) {{msg}}\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">lang</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;coffee&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\nmodule.exports =\r\n  data: -&gt;\r\n    msg: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Hello world!&#39;</span>\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	如果你不太熟悉预处理语言的语法，你可以使用第一种方式来定义组件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	vueify主页：<a href=\"https://github.com/vuejs/vueify\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" title=\"https://github.com/vuejs/vueify\">https://github.com/vuejs/vueify</a></p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	安装vue cli</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	vue cli是什么呢？官方的介绍如下：</p>\r\n<blockquote style=\"margin: 1em 40.75px; padding: 0px; background: none rgb(240, 240, 227); border-width: 2px 2px 2px 5px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(239, 239, 239) rgb(239, 239, 239) rgb(239, 239, 239) rgb(0, 83, 159); border-image: initial; min-height: 35px; line-height: 1.45; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px; position: relative; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n		A simple CLI for scaffolding Vue.js projects.</p>\r\n</blockquote>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	像Visual Studio这样的工具，在创建项目时可以直接选择Visual Studio内置的一些项目模板，例如：创建一个ASP.NET MVC或ASP.NET Web API项目。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	Vue.js提供了的一系列项目模板，但它没有Visual Studio这种可视化的工具。通过什么方式来使用项目模板呢？这就是vue cli要干的事儿。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<font color=\"#ff0000\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">安装要求：安装vue cli需要Node.js和Git，Node.js需要4.x版本以上。</font></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	我使用的是node 6.3.0版本：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184656639-1878962257.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/110340K28-1.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行以下命令安装vue cli</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"9be5dd58fad44e9492a1ba5b7189bb32\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nnpm install -g vue-cli</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	安装完vue cli后，我们就可以在git bash窗口中使用命令创建Vue.js的项目了。</p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	使用vue-browserify-simple模板</h1>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	1.生成项目</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	右键运行Git Bash Here</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716190000232-1016802342.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103402Q1-2.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在git bash下输入以下命令：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"fb4b413c97d3475199c621114067d627\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nvue init browserify-simple my-browserify-simple-demo</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">browserify-simple</code>是项目模板的名称，<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">my-browserify-simple-demo</code>是你要生成的项目名称。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184700654-211890725.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103405526-3.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行这个命令时，会有一些提示，一路按回车键。提示private (Y/n)时，根据需要输入Y或n，这里我输入了Y作为私有项目。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184703639-1336382246.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103404S8-4.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	目录下生成了一个文件夹my-browserify-simple-demo。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184705451-1179074601.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103402945-5.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	2. 项目结构说明</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	打开my-browserify-simple-demo文件夹，看到以下目录结构：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184707045-1048070516.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/110340G24-6.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	打开index.html文件，注意它所引用的build.js文件并不存在，后面我会告诉你dist/build.js文件是如何生成的。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"b73f53a553584b939a5819d814a85b8b\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;\r\n<span class=\"xml\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">lang</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;en&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">meta</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">charset</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;utf-8&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span>my-browserify-simple-demo<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">app</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">app</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dist/build.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span></span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	文件树结构如下：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"cs hljs \" id=\"c6bd89562db64c8aa9512be63950a60a\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n├─.babelrc	<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// babel配置文件</span>\r\n├─.gitignore	\r\n├─index.html	<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 主页</span>\r\n├─package.json	<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 项目配置文件</span>\r\n├─README.md  \r\n├─dist		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 发布目录</span>\r\n│   ├─.gitkeep       \r\n├─src		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 开发目录	</span>\r\n│   ├─App.vue	<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// App.vue组件</span>\r\n│   ├─main.js	<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 预编译入口</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这里要特别说明两个文件：<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">package.json</code>和<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">.babelrc</code>文件。</p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	package.json</h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	有很多初学者看到package.json文件就会头痛，这个文件到底是啥玩意儿，一堆看不懂的东西。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"b04fa44439ce4a64b1304508c1e9ad54\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n{\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;name&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;my-browserify-simple-demo&quot;</span>,\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;description&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;A Vue.js project&quot;</span>,\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;author&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;keepfool &lt;crmug@outlook.com&gt;&quot;</span>,\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;scripts&quot;</span>: {\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;watchify&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;watchify -vd -p browserify-hmr -e src/main.js -o dist/build.js&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;serve&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;http-server -c 1 -a localhost&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dev&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;npm-run-all --parallel watchify serve&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;build&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify src/main.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m &gt; dist/build.js&quot;</span>\r\n  },\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dependencies&quot;</span>: {\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;vue&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^1.0.0&quot;</span>\r\n  },\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;devDependencies&quot;</span>: {\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;babel-core&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^6.0.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;babel-plugin-transform-runtime&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^6.0.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;babel-preset-es2015&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^6.0.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;babel-preset-stage-2&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^6.0.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;babel-runtime&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^6.0.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;cross-env&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^1.0.6&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;babelify&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^7.2.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;browserify&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^12.0.1&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;browserify-hmr&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^0.3.1&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;http-server&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^0.9.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;npm-run-all&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^1.6.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;uglify-js&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^2.5.0&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;vueify&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^8.5.2&quot;</span>,\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;watchify&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;^3.4.0&quot;</span>\r\n  },\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;browserify&quot;</span>: {\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;transform&quot;</span>: [\r\n      <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;vueify&quot;</span>,\r\n      <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;babelify&quot;</span>\r\n    ]\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	package.json文件是项目配置文件，除了项目的一些基本信息外，有3个重要的节点我说明一下：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		dependencies：项目发布时的依赖</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		devDependencies：项目开发时的依赖</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		scripts：编译项目的一些命令</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	.babelrc文件</h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	.babelrc文件定义了ES6的转码规则，基于ES6编写的js代码在编译时都会被babel转码器转换为ES5代码。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"a84ee5fd07c74b47a0f53fe174daec6c\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n{\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;presets&quot;</span>: [<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;es2015&quot;</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;stage-2&quot;</span>],\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;plugins&quot;</span>: [<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;transform-runtime&quot;</span>]\r\n}\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<font color=\"#ff0000\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">为什么要将ES6转换为ES5呢？因为我们将使用ES6的一些语法来编写.vue组件，而有些浏览器目前还没有全面支持ES6。</font></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	babel是一个非常有名的ES6转码器，babel主页：<a href=\"https://babeljs.io/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" title=\"https://babeljs.io/\">https://babeljs.io/</a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	3. 安装依赖</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行以下命令安装项目依赖：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"cs hljs \" id=\"fce75c48306a41d3b5fadee85be60a5f\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\ncd my-browserify-simple-demo\r\nnpm install</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	安装完成后，目录下会产生一个node_modules文件夹。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184709279-2073475162.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103405V5-7.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	项目相关的依赖都存放在这个文件夹下了。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184711529-646375648.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/110340I63-8.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	4. 运行示例</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行以下命令运行示例：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"cs hljs \" id=\"06b1fa06c41840c7ab58f26fab0c574b\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nnpm run dev\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184713045-147688229.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103404316-9.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在执行该命令后，dist目录下会生成一个build.js文件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184714576-1255392326.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"223\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103403943-10.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"361\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	打开127.0.0.1:8080，可以看到以下画面：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184716139-421371947.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"416\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/110340HQ-11.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"586\" /></a></p>\r\n<p class=\"note\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 12px 15px; position: relative; background: rgb(255, 244, 204); border-left: 5px solid rgb(255, 224, 112); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">注意：</strong>之前我使用的node是4.4.5的版本，执行这个命令会出现一个错误：cann&#39;t find module vue-hot-reload api..，我将node.js升级到6.3.0版本后，删除node_modules文件夹，然后再次执行npm install命令重新安装依赖以后，该问题就解决了。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	5. 编译过程说明</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	build.js文件是怎么产生的呢？我们把它分为两种情况：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		开发时生成build.js</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		发布时生成build.js</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	何为开发时和发布时？开发过.NET童鞋，可以简单的理解为debug模式和release模式。</p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	开发时成成build.js</h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在package.json文件的scripts节点下，有3行配置：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"0e1e708c86524c779eeebc5a089815d7\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;scripts&quot;</span>: {\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;watchify&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;watchify -vd -p browserify-hmr -e src/main.js -o dist/build.js&quot;</span>,\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;serve&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;http-server -c 1 -a localhost&quot;</span>,\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dev&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;npm-run-all --parallel watchify serve&quot;</span>\r\n}</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap;
