background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">npm run dev</code>命令执行的是<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">dev</code>节点对应的命令<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">npm-run-all --parallel watchify serve</code>&nbsp;，这行命令是依赖于<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">watchify</code>的，也就是下面这行命令：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"57415152f6e4464ebb34290ba5f5408f\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nwatchify -vd -p browserify-hmr -e src/main.js -o dist/build.js</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	你不用纠结这行命令的每个参数是什么意思，只需要理解src/main.js &ndash;o dist/build.js的含义：</p>\r\n<div class=\"bs-callout bs-callout-info\" style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 20px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) rgb(238, 238, 238) rgb(238, 238, 238) rgb(27, 128, 158); border-image: initial; border-radius: 3px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<font color=\"#ff0000\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">编译src/main.js文件，然后输出到dist/build.js</font></div>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	serve节点的命令<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">http-server -c 1 -a localhost</code>用于开启http-server，http-server是一个简易的web服务器。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	下面这幅流程图描述了这个编译过程：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184717545-22817188.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"548\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/110340F10-12.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"337\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在git bash窗口执行<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">npm run dev</code>命令时，也能够观察到编译过程。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184718967-1851470058.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/110340EV-13.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">watchify</code>是什么东东呢？<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">browserify</code>的编译是比较缓慢的，当一个<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">browserify</code>项目开始变大时，编译打包的时间会变得较长。<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">watchify</code>是一个<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">browserify</code>的封装，其在package.json中的配置和browserify是一样的。它可以持续件监视文件的改动，<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">并且只重新打包必要的文件</strong>。在一个大型的项目中使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">watchify</code>，第一次打包的时候可能还会花较长时间，但是后续的编译打包将消耗较短的时间。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	更多的watchify信息，请参考：<a href=\"https://github.com/substack/watchify/\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\" title=\"https://github.com/substack/watchify/\">https://github.com/substack/watchify/</a></p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	发布时生成build.js</h3>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在理解了上述编译过程后，发布时build.js就不难理解了。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"ee63bae36f7940e8af89e17994a0b499\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;build&quot;</span>: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify src/main.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m &gt; dist/build.js&quot;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">npm run build</code>命令可以生成发布时的build.js。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184720217-1606368274.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/110340BH-14.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	uglifyjs是基于nodejs的压缩程序，用于压缩HTML/CSS/JS，执行<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">npm run build</code>命令后生成的build.js就是经过压缩的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184722295-523118632.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"131\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103403429-15.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"531\" /></a></p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	使用vue-browserify模板</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">simple-browserify</code>模板用于构筑基于browserify和vueify的开发环境，<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">browserify</code>模板则提供了更多内容：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		提供了ESLint：用于格式化JavaScript和检查JavaScript代码风格。</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		提供了单元测试：使用PhantomJS with Karma + karma-jasmine + karma-browserify的单元测试, 支持ES2015和mock。</li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	1.生成项目</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	重新打开一个git bash窗口，执行以下命令：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"cs hljs \" id=\"89b04531aea7439c97ffd45fb7fdd474\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nvue init browserify my-browserify-demo</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">browserify</code>是项目模板，<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">my-browserify-demo</code>是项目名称。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184723701-1664616654.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103401937-16.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	目录下生成了一个文件夹my-browserify-demo：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184725811-377223471.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103401612-17.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	文件目录结构如下：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"65448efebaa84961b6b884dfc04ab5f8\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n├─.babelrc		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// babel配置文件</span>\r\n├─.eslintrc		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// eslint配置文件</span>\r\n├─.gitignore	\r\n├─index.html		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 主页</span>\r\n├─karma.conf.js		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// karma配置文件</span>\r\n├─package.json		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 项目配置文件</span>\r\n├─README.md  \r\n├─dist			<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 发布目录</span>\r\n│   ├─.gitkeep       \r\n├─src			<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 开发目录	</span>\r\n│   ├─App.vue		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// App.vue组件</span>\r\n│   ├─main.js		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 预编译入口</span>\r\n│   ├─components		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 组件目录</span>\r\n│   ├──Hello.vue		<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// Hello.vue组件</span>\r\n├─test			<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 单元测试目录	</span>\r\n│   ├─unit	 \r\n│   ├──Hello.spec.js	<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// Hello.vue单元测试</span></pre>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	2. 安装依赖</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行以下两行命令，安装项目依赖：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"cs hljs \" id=\"55888834413442a18abc69a638c90425\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\ncd my-browserify-demo\r\nnpm install</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184727623-1420385631.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103405Z8-18.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	（安装过程较为缓慢，需要耐心等待&hellip;）</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	3. 运行示例</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	执行npm run dev命令启动http-server。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184729373-907765518.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"466\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103402046-19.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"661\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在浏览器中输入地址127.0.0.1:8080，可以看到以下画面：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184730967-1528554710.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"442\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103403018-20.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"586\" /></a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	示例说明</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	注意main.js, App.vue和Hello.vue三者之间的关系。</p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	main.js</h3>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"ed3c4db8128c428d8263a0361df1b49f\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nimport Vue from <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;vue&#39;</span>\r\nimport App from <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;./App.vue&#39;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">/* eslint-disable no-new */</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n  el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;body&#39;</span>,\r\n  components: { App }\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">import Vue from &#39;vue&#39;</code>这行代码表示引入vue.js，在编译时会从node_modules文件夹下寻找vue.js。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184732811-1306677049.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"606\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103402J2-21.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"782\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">import App from &#39;./App.vue&#39;&nbsp;</code>表示引入同目录下的App.vue组件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160716184734482-1001876066.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"285\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1103404J0-22.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 800px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"325\" /></a></p>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	App.vue</h3>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"af6949b8408d4018bd819d88311cd8b5\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">hello</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">hello</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\nimport Hello from <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;./components/Hello.vue&#39;</span>\r\n\r\nexport <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">default</span> {\r\n  components: {\r\n    Hello\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">style</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"css\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">body</span> <span class=\"hljs-rules\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">{\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">font-family</span>:<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"> Helvetica, sans-serif</span></span>;\r\n<span class=\"hljs-rule\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">}</span></span>\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">style</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">import Hello from &#39;./components/Hello.vue&#39;&nbsp;</code>表示引入components目录下的<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Hello.vue</code>组件。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Hello.vue</code>是<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">App.vue</code>的子组件：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"e118b5220b62413da93d52cdbe195bb6\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nexport <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">default</span> {\r\n  components: {\r\n    Hello\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</pre>\r\n<h3 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.3em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(30, 144, 255); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	Hello.vue</h3>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"ef4e95e2fd7045929b5f460990205f4e\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;hello&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span>&gt;</span>{{ msg }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span>&gt;</span>\r\n  <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\nexport <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">default</span> {\r\n  data () {\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> {\r\n      <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// Note: modifying `msg` below will not cause changes to occur with</span>\r\n      <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// hot-reload. As reloaded components preserve their initial state,</span>\r\n      <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// modifying these values will have no effect.</span>\r\n      msg: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;Hello World!&#39;</span>\r\n    }\r\n  }\r\n}\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Hello.vue</code>组件没有任何依赖，它仅仅输出一段简单的文字。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	vue-browserify-simple示例</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	介绍完了这两种模板，我们就来做个小示例吧，下面这个示例使用的是vue-browserify-simple模板。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"ce76a98147df42668794a6a740e6137f\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	vue.js官方提供的browserify项目模板，可以让我们很轻松地投入到vue.js的组件开发中。熟练使用这样的模板项目，不仅将组件代码给分离出来了，使得组件可以被重复利用，而且有助于组件代码的管理。</p>\r\n','','','127.0.0.1','','');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('27','19','<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	概述</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	上一篇我们介绍了如何使用vue resource处理HTTP请求，结合服务端的REST API，就能够很容易地构建一个增删查改应用。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	这个应用始终遗留了一个问题，Web App在访问REST API时，没有经过任何认证，这使得服务端的REST API是不安全的，只要有人知道api地址，就可以调用API对服务端的资源进行修改和删除。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	今天我们就来探讨一下如何结合Web API来限制资源的访问。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;
