padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	编译作用域</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	尽管使用组件就像使用一般的HTML元素一样，但它毕竟不是标准的HTML元素，为了让浏览器能够识别它，组件会被解析为标准的HTML片段，然后将组件的标签替换为该HTML片段。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"79179d4b87454fbd89d38ff6cde650b1\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;myComponent&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h2</span>&gt;</span>{{ msg }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h2</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-on:click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;showMsg&quot;</span>&gt;</span>Show Message<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n        el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>,\r\n        components: {\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>: {\r\n                template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#myComponent&#39;</span>,\r\n                data: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n                    <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> {\r\n                        msg: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;This is a component!&#39;</span>\r\n                    }\r\n                },\r\n                methods: {\r\n                    showMsg: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n                        alert(<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">this</span>.msg)\r\n                    }\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    })\r\n</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这段代码定义了一个my-component组件，&lt;my-component&gt;&lt;my-component&gt;不是标准的HTML元素，浏览器是不理解这个元素的。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	那么Vue是如何让浏览器理解&lt;my-component&gt;&lt;my-component&gt;标签的呢？（下图是我个人的理解）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121615218-1886073521.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"435\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1113504c2-0.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"700\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在创建一个Vue实例时，除了将它挂载到某个HTML元素下，还要编译组件，将组件转换为HTML片段。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	除此之外，Vue实例还会识别其所挂载的元素下的&lt;my-component&gt;标签，然后将&lt;my-component&gt;标签替换为HTML片段。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	实际上浏览器仍然是不理解&lt;my-component&gt;标签的，我们可以通过查看源码了解到这一点。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121616937-189165102.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"383\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1113503921-1.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"462\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	组件在使用前，经过编译已经被转换为HTML片段了，组件是有一个作用域的，那么组件的作用域是什么呢？<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	你可以将它理解为组件模板包含的HTML片段，组件模板内容之外就不是组件的作用域了。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	例如，my-component组件的作用域只是下面这个小片段。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121617952-1446309471.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"118\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1113506404-2.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"529\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	组件的模板是在其作用域内编译的，那么组件选项对象中的数据也应该是在组件模板中使用的。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	考虑下面的代码，在Vue实例和组件的data选项中分别追加一个display属性：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" id=\"90fed249f33d438a94477478b0b893a0\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n    el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>,\r\n    data: {\r\n        display: <span class=\"hljs-literal\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">true</span>\r\n    },\r\n    components: {\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>: {\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#myComponent&#39;</span>,\r\n            data: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> {\r\n                    msg: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;This is a component!&#39;</span>,\r\n                    display: <span class=\"hljs-literal\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">false</span>\r\n                }\r\n            },\r\n            methods: {\r\n                showMsg: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n                    alert(<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">this</span>.msg)\r\n                }\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n})</pre>\r\n<span style=\"color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">然后在my-component标签上使用指令</span><code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">v-show=&quot;display&quot;</code><span style=\"color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">，这个display数据是来源于Vue实例，还是my-component组件呢？</span>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"c8b167d028d84538afe222139bcdba36\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-show</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;display&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	答案是Vue实例。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	至此，我们应该认识到组件的作用域是独立的：</p>\r\n<div class=\"bs-callout bs-callout-info\" style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 20px; border-width: 1px 1px 1px 5px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) rgb(238, 238, 238) rgb(238, 238, 238) rgb(27, 128, 158); border-image: initial; border-radius: 3px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">父组件模板的内容在父组件作用域内编译；子组件模板的内容在子组件作用域内编译</strong></div>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	通俗地讲，在子组件中定义的数据，只能用在子组件的模板。在父组件中定义的数据，只能用在父组件的模板。如果父组件的数据要在子组件中使用，则需要子组件定义props。</p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	使用Slot</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	为了让组件可以组合，我们需要一种方式来混合父组件的内容与子组件自己的模板。这个处理称为内容分发，Vue.js 实现了一个内容分发 API，使用特殊的 &lt;slot&gt; 元素作为原始内容的插槽。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	如果不理解这段话，可以先跳过，你只要知道&lt;slot&gt;元素是一个内容插槽。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	单个Slot</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	下面的代码在定义my-component组件的模板时，指定了一个&lt;slot&gt;&lt;/slot&gt;元素。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"2b7c0fe780f24449a111d85f3df1b984\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span>&gt;</span>Hello Vue.js!<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;myComponent&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;content&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h2</span>&gt;</span>This is a component!<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h2</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">slot</span>&gt;</span>如果没有分发内容，则显示slot中的内容<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">slot</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>Say something...<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n    Vue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>, {\r\n        template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#myComponent&#39;</span>\r\n    })\r\n\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n        el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>\r\n    })\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这段代码运行结果如下：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121619687-843125897.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"410\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1113501A8-3.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"645\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	第一个&lt;my-component&gt;标签有一段分发内容<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">&lt;h1&gt;Hello Vue.js!&lt;/h1&gt;</code>，渲染组件时显示了这段内容。<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121621593-1228584080.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"302\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1113501E2-4.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"561\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	第二个&lt;my-component&gt;标签则没有，渲染组件时则显示了slot标签中的内容。</p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/02.Components/Part-2/single-slot.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	指定名称的slot</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	上面这个示例是一个匿名slot，它只能表示一个插槽。<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">如果需要多个内容插槽，则可以为slot元素指定name属性。</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	多个slot一起使用时，会非常有用。例如，对话框是HTML常用的一种交互方式。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	在不同的运用场景下，对话框的头部、主体内容、底部可能是不一样的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121622406-1338785617.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"332\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11135022T-5.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"403\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这时，使用不同名称的slot就能轻易解决这个问题了。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"7f9d50b136ee45d2a144f4818158af61\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n    Vue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;modal-dialog&#39;</span>, {\r\n        template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#dialog-template&#39;</span>,\r\n        props: [<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;show&#39;</span>],\r\n        methods: {\r\n            close: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">this</span>.show = <span class=\"hljs-literal\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">false</span>\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    })\r\n\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n        el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>,\r\n        data: {\r\n            show: <span class=\"hljs-literal\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">false</span>\r\n        },\r\n        methods: {\r\n            openDialog: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">this</span>.show = <span class=\"hljs-literal\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">true</span>\r\n            },\r\n            closeDialog: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span> {</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">this</span>.show = <span class=\"hljs-literal\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">false</span>\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    })\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在定义modal-dialog组件的template时，我们使用了3个slot，它们的name特性分别是header、body和footer。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在&lt;modal-dialog&gt;标签下，分别为三个元素指定slot特性：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"4df881df349140d08897dc824ac460e5\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">modal-dialog</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:show.sync</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;show&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">header</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialog-header&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">slot</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;header&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialog-title&quot;</span>&gt;</span>提示信息<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">header</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialog-body&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">slot</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;body&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>你想在对话框中放什么内容都可以！<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>你可以放一段文字，也可以放一些表单，或者是一些图片。<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">footer</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialog-footer&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">slot</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;footer&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;btn&quot;</span> @<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;closeDialog&quot;</span>&gt;</span>关闭<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">footer</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">modal-dialog</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;btn btn-open&quot;</span> @<span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;openDialog&quot;</span>&gt;</span>打开对话框<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">对话框的标题内容、主体内容、底部内容，完全由我们自定义，而且这些内容就是一些简单的HTML元素！</strong></p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/02.Components/Part-2/dialog-slot.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121623609-650154017.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"12\" height=\"582\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1113503550-6.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"12\" width=\"640\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	如果需要定制对话框的样式，我们只需要在&lt;modal-dialog&gt;上追加一个v-bind指令，让它绑定一个class。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"b22e785523154b3bb1e3f399602a02d4\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">modal-dialog</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:show.sync</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;show&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialogClass&quot;</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	然后修改一下Vue实例，在data选项中追加一个dialogClass属性，然后修改openDialog()方法：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"eed307bf58174040a454d8deb2724200\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nnew Vue({\r\n    el: &#39;#app&#39;,\r\n    data: {\r\n        show: false,\r\n        dialogClass: &#39;dialog-info&#39;\r\n    },\r\n    methods: {\r\n        openDialog: function(dialogClass) {\r\n            this.show = true\r\n            this.dialogClass = dialogClass\r\n        },\r\n        closeDialog: function() {\r\n            this.show = false\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/02.Components/Part-2/dialog-slot-with-class.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121627327-1821615579.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"13\" height=\"582\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1113505G3-7.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"13\" width=\"640\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	虽然我们在modal-dialog组件中定义了3个slot，但是在页面中使用它时，并不用每次都指定这3个slot。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	比如，有时候我们可能只需要header和body：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"b59caa29a8674017a481a4830a17743d\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">modal-dialog</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:show.sync</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;show&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialogClass&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">header</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialog-header&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">slot</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;header&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialog-title&quot;</span>&gt;</span>提示信息<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">h1</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">header</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">class</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;dialog-body&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">slot</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;body&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>你想在对话框中放什么内容都可以！<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>你可以放一段文字，也可以放一些表单，或者是一些图片。<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">p</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">modal-dialog</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	现在看到的对话框是没有底部的，只有标题和主体内容。</p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/02.Components/Part-2/dialog-slot-with-class-no-footer.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201607/341820-20160703121632327-488463079.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"14\" height=\"582\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1113503K6-8.gif\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; max-width: 700px; display: inline;\" title=\"14\" width=\"640\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	多个slot同时使用的场景还有很多，例如：用户的注册、登录、找回密码等这些表单集合，也可以用一个组件来完成。</p>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	父子组件之间的访问</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	有时候我们需要父组件访问子组件，子组件访问父组件，或者是子组件访问根组件。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	针对这几种情况，Vue.js都提供了相应的API：</p>\r\n<ul style=\"margin: 10px 0px 10px 50px; padding: 2px 32px; border-left: 4px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		父组件访问子组件：使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">$children</code>或$<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">refs</code></li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		子组件访问父组件：使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">$parent</code></li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: disc;\">\r\n		子组件访问根组件：使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">$root</code></li>\r\n</ul>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	$children示例</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	下面这段代码定义了3个组件：父组件parent-component，两个子组件child-component1和child-component2。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在父组件中，通过<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">this.$children</code>可以访问子组件。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">this.$children</code>是一个数组，它包含所有子组件的实例。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" id=\"d6ab392acdbd486593144d422b77fc05\" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-on:click</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;showChildComponentData&quot;</span>&gt;</span>显示子组件的数据<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">button</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px;
