padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	请注意第4点，以下代码在3个地方使用了&lt;my-component&gt;标签，但只有#app1和#app2下的&lt;my-component&gt;标签才起到作用。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app1&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app2&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!--该组件不会被渲染--&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> myComponent = Vue.extend({\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;div&gt;This is a component!&lt;/div&gt;&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n        Vue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>, myComponent)\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> app1 = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app1&#39;</span>\r\n        });\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> app2 = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app2&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n    </span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160629071634546-1544720172.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"589\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1125201936-3.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"525\" /></a></p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/02.Components/Part-1/component-scope.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	全局注册和局部注册</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">调用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Vue.component()</code>注册组件时，组件的注册是全局的，这意味着该组件可以在任意Vue示例下使用。</strong><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	如果不需要全局注册，或者是让组件使用在其它组件内，可以用<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">选项对象的components属性实现局部注册</strong>。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	上面的示例可以改为局部注册的方式：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!-- 3. my-component只能在#app下使用--&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 1.创建一个组件构造器</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> myComponent = Vue.extend({\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;div&gt;This is my first component!&lt;/div&gt;&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>,\r\n            components: {\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 2. 将myComponent组件注册到Vue实例下</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span> : myComponent\r\n            }\r\n        });\r\n    </span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	由于my-component组件是注册在#app元素对应的Vue实例下的，所以它不能在其它Vue实例下使用。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app2&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">&lt;!-- 不能使用my-component组件，因为my-component是一个局部组件，它属于#app--&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n        el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app2&#39;</span>\r\n    });\r\n</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	如果你这样做了，浏览器会提示一个错误：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160629071637687-1069238101.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"282\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1125204335-4.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"644\" /></a></p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/02.Components/Part-1/local-registration.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	父组件和子组件</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	我们可以在组件中定义并使用其他组件，这就构成了父子组件的关系。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">parent-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">parent-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> Child = Vue.extend({\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;p&gt;This is a child component!&lt;/p&gt;&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> Parent = Vue.extend({\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 在Parent组件内使用&lt;child-component&gt;标签</span>\r\n            template :<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;p&gt;This is a Parent component&lt;/p&gt;&lt;child-component&gt;&lt;/child-component&gt;&#39;</span>,\r\n            components: {\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 局部注册Child组件，该组件只能在Parent组件内使用</span>\r\n                <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;child-component&#39;</span>: Child\r\n            }\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 全局注册Parent组件</span>\r\n        Vue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;parent-component&#39;</span>, Parent)\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n    </span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	这段代码的运行结果如下：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160629071640499-1231738041.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1125204604-5.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"440\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	我们分几个步骤来理解这段代码：</p>\r\n<ol style=\"margin: 0px 0px 0px 30px; padding-right: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 10px 0px 5px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 158, 194);\">var Child = Vue.extend(...)</span></code>定义一了个Child组件构造器</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 158, 194);\">var Parent = Vue.extend(...)</span></code>定义一个Parent组件构造器</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">components: { &#39;child-component&#39;: Child }</code>，将Child组件注册到Parent组件，并将Child组件的标签设置为<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">child-component</code>。</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(128, 158, 194);\">template :&#39;&lt;p&gt;This is a Parent component&lt;/p&gt;&lt;</span>child-component&gt;&lt;/child-component&gt;&#39;</code>，在Parent组件内以标签的形式使用Child组件。</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Vue.component(&#39;parent-component&#39;, Parent)&nbsp;</code>全局注册Parent组件</li>\r\n	<li style=\"margin: 5px 0px 10px; padding: 0px; list-style: decimal;\">\r\n		在页面中使用&lt;parent-component&gt;标签渲染Parent组件的内容，同时Child组件的内容也被渲染出来</li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160629071642859-666561999.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"461\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/112520C60-6.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"698\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	Child组件是在Parent组件中注册的，它只能在Parent组件中使用，确切地说：<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">子组件只能在父组件的template中使用。</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	请注意下面两种子组件的使用方式是错误的：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">1. 以子标签的形式在父组件中使用</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">parent-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">child-component</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">child-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">parent-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	为什么这种方式无效呢？因为当子组件注册到父组件时，Vue.js会编译好父组件的模板，模板的内容已经决定了父组件将要渲染的HTML。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">&lt;parent-component&gt;&hellip;&lt;/parent-component&gt;</code>相当于运行时，它的一些子标签只会被当作普通的HTML来执行，&lt;child-component&gt;&lt;/child-component&gt;不是标准的HTML标签，会被浏览器直接忽视掉。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">2. 在父组件标签外使用子组件</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">parent-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">parent-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">child-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">child-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	运行这段代码，浏览器会提示以下错误</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160629071645687-1715605797.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"589\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1125205359-7.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"525\" /></a></p>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/02.Components/Part-1/local-registration-with-child-component.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	组件注册语法糖</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	以上组件注册的方式有些繁琐，Vue.js为了简化这个过程，提供了注册语法糖。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">使用Vue.component()直接创建和注册组件：</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 全局注册，my-component1是标签名称</span>\r\nVue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component1&#39;</span>,{\r\n    template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;div&gt;This is the first component!&lt;/div&gt;&#39;</span>\r\n})\r\n\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> vm1 = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n    el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app1&#39;</span>\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Vue.component()</code>的第1个参数是标签名称，第2个参数是一个选项对象，使用选项对象的template属性定义组件模板。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	使用这种方式，Vue在背后会自动地调用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Vue.extend()</code>。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">在选项对象的components属性中实现局部注册：</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> vm2 = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n    el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app2&#39;</span>,\r\n    components: {\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 局部注册，my-component2是标签名称</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component2&#39;</span>: {\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;div&gt;This is the second component!&lt;/div&gt;&#39;</span>\r\n        },\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-comment\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 128, 128); font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Tahoma, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB W3&quot;, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;;\">// 局部注册，my-component3是标签名称</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component3&#39;</span>: {\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;&lt;div&gt;This is the third component!&lt;/div&gt;&#39;</span>\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<p class=\"demo\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 15px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245); border-radius: 4px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); overflow: hidden; font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a class=\"btn-demo\" href=\"https://keepfool.github.io/vue-tutorials/02.Components/Part-1/registration-sugar.html\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 5px 20px; outline: none; box-sizing: border-box; background-color: rgb(25, 181, 134); border: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.5; text-shadow: rgba(35, 69, 90, 0.509804) 0px -1px 0px; border-radius: 3px; box-shadow: rgb(205, 219, 226) 0px 2px 2px; transition: opacity 0.2s linear; color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;\" target=\"_blank\">View Demo</a></p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	使用script或template标签</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	尽管语法糖简化了组件注册，但在template选项中拼接HTML元素比较麻烦，这也导致了HTML和JavaScript的高耦合性。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	庆幸的是，Vue.js提供了两种方式将定义在JavaScript中的HTML模板分离出来。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">使用&lt;script&gt;标签</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;\r\n<span class=\"xml\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">type</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;text/x-template&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;myComponent&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n            &lt;div&gt;This is a component!<span class=\"xml\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        </span></span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n        \r\n        Vue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>,{\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#myComponent&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n    </span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span></span></pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	template选项现在不再是HTML元素，而是一个id，Vue.js根据这个id查找对应的元素，然后将这个元素内的HTML作为模板进行编译。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160629071649421-60207980.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"305\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/11252063E-8.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"523\" /></a></p>\r\n<p class=\"note\" style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 12px 15px; position: relative; background: rgb(255, 244, 204); border-left: 5px solid rgb(255, 224, 112); color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">注意：</strong>使用&lt;script&gt;标签时，type指定为text/x-template，意在告诉浏览器这不是一段js脚本，浏览器在解析HTML文档时会忽略&lt;script&gt;标签内定义的内容。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160629071652031-2094470934.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"84\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1125203554-9.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"301\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">使用&lt;template&gt;标签</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	如果使用<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">&lt;template&gt;</code>标签，则不需要指定type属性。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-doctype\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(153, 153, 153); font-weight: bold;\">&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">meta</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">charset</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;UTF-8&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">title</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">head</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;myComponent&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>This is a component!<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">div</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">body</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">src</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;js/vue.js&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"javascript\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\r\n        \r\n        Vue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>,{\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#myComponent&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n            el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>\r\n        })\r\n        \r\n    </span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">script</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">html</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	在理解了组件的创建和注册过程后，我建议使用&lt;script&gt;或&lt;template&gt;标签来定义组件的HTML模板。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	这使得HTML代码和JavaScript代码是分离的，便于阅读和维护。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	另外，在Vue.js中，可创建.vue后缀的文件，在.vue文件中定义组件，这个内容我会在后面的文章介绍。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	组件的el和data选项</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	传入Vue构造器的多数选项也可以用在&nbsp;<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Vue.extend()</code>&nbsp;或<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">Vue.component()</code>中，不过有两个特例：&nbsp;<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">data</code>&nbsp;和<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">el</code>。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	Vue.js规定：<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">在定义组件的选项时，data和el选项必须使用函数。</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">下面的代码在执行时，浏览器会提出一个错误</strong></p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nVue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>, {\r\n    data: {\r\n        a: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span>\r\n    }\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<a href=\"http://images2015.cnblogs.com/blog/341820/201606/341820-20160629071654374-100591945.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; outline: none; color: cornflowerblue;\"><img alt=\"image\" border=\"0\" height=\"237\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180222/1125205O3-10.png\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; border-width: 0px; border-style: solid !important; border-color: rgb(238, 238, 238) !important; border-image: initial !important; max-width: 700px; background-image: none; display: inline;\" title=\"image\" width=\"612\" /></a></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	另外，如果data选项指向某个对象，这意味着所有的组件实例共用一个data。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	我们应当使用一个函数作为 data 选项，让这个函数返回一个新对象：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\nVue.component(<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>, {\r\n    data: <span class=\"hljs-function\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">function</span><span class=\"hljs-params\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 255);\">()</span>{</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">return</span> {a : <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">1</span>}\r\n    }\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<h1 style=\"margin: 15px 0px 15px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 1.7em; line-height: 1.5; clear: both; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); position: relative; border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(226, 227, 228); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	使用props</h1>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">组件实例的作用域是孤立的</strong>。这意味着不能并且不应该在子组件的模板内直接引用父组件的数据。可以使用&nbsp;<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">props</strong>&nbsp;把数据传给子组件。</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 5px 0px 5px 5px; padding: 10px 20px; line-height: 1.5; color: rgb(255, 99, 71); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif;\">\r\n	props基础示例</h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	下面的代码定义了一个子组件my-component，在Vue实例中定义了data选项。</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">var</span> vm = <span class=\"hljs-keyword\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(149, 65, 33);\">new</span> Vue({\r\n    el: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#app&#39;</span>,\r\n    data: {\r\n        name: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;keepfool&#39;</span>,\r\n        age: <span class=\"hljs-number\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(64, 160, 112);\">28</span>\r\n    },\r\n    components: {\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;my-component&#39;</span>: {\r\n            template: <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;#myComponent&#39;</span>,\r\n            props: [<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;myName&#39;</span>, <span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&#39;myAge&#39;</span>]\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n})\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	为了便于理解，你可以将这个Vue实例看作my-component的父组件。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\" />\r\n	如果我们想使父组件的数据，则必须先在子组件中定义props属性，也就是<code style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 4px; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; font-size: 14.4px; color: rgb(199, 37, 78); white-space: nowrap; background-color: rgb(249, 242, 244); border-radius: 4px;\">props: [&#39;myName&#39;, &#39;myAge&#39;]</code>这行代码。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	定义子组件的HTML模板：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"xml hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">id</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;myComponent&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">table</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">tr</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">th</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">colspan</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;2&quot;</span>&gt;</span>\r\n                子组件数据\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">th</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">tr</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">tr</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>my name<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>{{ myName }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">tr</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">tr</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>my age<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>\r\n            <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>{{ myAge }}<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">td</span>&gt;</span>\r\n        <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">tr</span>&gt;</span>\r\n    <span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">table</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">template</span>&gt;</span>\r\n</pre>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 10px 10px 10px 50px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(47, 79, 79); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, &quot;Micrsoft YaHei&quot;, 微软雅黑, &quot;WenQuanYi Micro Hei&quot;, Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px;\">\r\n	将父组件数据通过已定义好的props属性传递给子组件：</p>\r\n<pre class=\"javascript hljs \" style=\"margin: 0px 40.75px 10px; padding: 15px 25px; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; font-size: 0.9em; line-height: 1.42857; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); word-break: break-all; background: rgb(248, 248, 255); border-radius: 0.3em; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; max-height: 600px; border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); overflow: auto; text-size-adjust: none;\">\r\n&lt;div id=<span class=\"hljs-string\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;app&quot;</span>&gt;\r\n    <span class=\"xml\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:my-name</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;name&quot;</span> <span class=\"hljs-attribute\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 128, 128);\">v-bind:my-age</span>=<span class=\"hljs-value\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(33, 145, 97);\">&quot;age&quot;</span>&gt;</span><span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(0, 0, 128);\">&lt;/<span class=\"hljs-title\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;\">my-component</span>&gt;</span>\r\n<span class=\"hljs-tag\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px;
